entry.title: Recent works
entry.summary: My late work is using mixed media (usually native wood) and glass - paints are inspired by traditional Maori tattoos
entry.content: My late work is using mixed media (usually native wood) and glass - paints are inspired by traditional Maori tattoos

entry.title: Sculptures
entry.summary: I explore different techniques and materials creating sculptures and bigger solitaires.
entry.content: I explore different techniques and materials creating sculptures and bigger solitaires.

entry.title: Home Decor
entry.summary: Stained glass windows, doors and furniture for your home
entry.content: Stained glass windows, doors and furniture for your home

entry.title: Glassart
entry.summary: Tiffani glass bowls and vases, standalone lamps and light shades
entry.content: Tiffani glass bowls and vases, standalone lamps and light shades

entry.title: Paintings
entry.summary: I've focused on paintings and drawings in the earlier stages of my career.
entry.content: I've focused on paintings and drawings in the earlier stages of my career.

entry.title: Exhibitions
entry.summary: I exhibited extensively back in Europe and I keep having one bigger exhibition every year in the New Zealand.
entry.content: I exhibited extensively back in Europe and I keep having one bigger exhibition every year in the New Zealand.

entry.title: Kaan Zamaan
entry.summary: My first exhibition after coming to New Zealand from Europe (January 2015, Kerikeri, New Zealand).
entry.content:
My first exhibition after coming to New Zealand from Europe (January 2015, Kerikeri, New Zealand).

I was very lucky to meet Julia Reinholt in Kerikeri soon after my arrival and after I settled in the new home it didn't take a long and I've got an opportunity to showcase all my original art work I brought from the Czech Republic in her beautiful gallery.

entry.title: Unicov
